text: There are more than 10 million children
living on the streets of India,

All with a desperate
need for help.

ITWILLBE is a Spanish NGO
that takes advantage of technology

to make social projects
around the world more efficient.

Our mission is to ensure
that vulnerable groups
are supported and protected.
One of our key projects,

Child PPa or Child Protection Application,
create a secure digital identity

Child PPa or Child Protection Application,
create a secure digital identity

for children who live
on the streets in India.

By providing them
a unique digital ID,

we can guarantee that these children
are recognised and protected.
Through the AWS Giveback Program,

We have developed an advanced
biometric identification system

that uses facial recognition
powered by artificial intelligence
to identify vulnerable children.

Now, the information about 
each child is stored securely

and accessible in various centers,
which allows social workers

to provide consistent care and 
access to essential health services
and education.

Our vision is a world
where no child is invisible.

We want to expand the reach of 
Child PPa to new regions

and eventually serve
more than 200,000 children.

AWS allows us to scale our mission
in a safe and efficient manner,

helping us to protect more 
children around the world.
